text: athava, bhumiye nivasayeagyamakkukayum, atinitayil nadikaluntakkukayum, atin urapp nalkunna parvvatannal untakkukayum, rantutaram jalasayannalkkitayil oru tatas'sam untakkukayum ceytavanea? (atea avarute daivannalea?) allahuveateappam marru valla daivavumuntea? alla, avaril adhikaperum ariyunnilla
